sections.purpose: To describe the standard operating procedure for the operation of Tray Dryer for batch drying of materials.
sections.scope: Applicable to drying activities carried out in the Pharmaceutics.
procedure: Ensure the dryer chamber and trays are clean and dry.
Spread the wet material uniformly on the trays (avoid thick layers).
Place the trays in the dryer racks and close the door securely.
Switch ON the main power and set the required temperature.
Turn ON the air circulation fan and heating elements.
Monitor the temperature periodically during the drying cycle.
Turn the material on the trays occasionally for uniform drying if needed.
Once the material is dry, turn OFF the heater and allow cooling.
Remove the trays and collect the dried product.
Clean the chamber and trays thoroughly after each batch.
precautions: Do not block the air circulation vents inside the chamber.
Maintain temperature within the specified range for heat-sensitive materials.
Ensure proper exhaust of moisture-laden air.
Wear heat-resistant gloves when handling hot trays.
Avoid overloading the dryer beyond its capacity.
